mapper.select: select B.boardNo, B.title, B.userId, DATE_FORMAT(B.writeDate, '%m월 %d일') AS writeDate, B.contents, B.imagePath, B.imageName, U.nickname from board_tbl B join users_tbl U on B.userId = U.id order by B.writeDate desc;

select B.boardNo, B.title, B.userId, DATE_FORMAT(B.writeDate, '%m월 %d일') AS writeDate, B.contents, B.imageName, U.nickname, U.username from board_tbl B join users_tbl U on B.userId = U.id where B.boardNo = #{boardNo};
mapper.insert: insert into board_tbl(userId, title, writeDate, contents, imagePath, imageName) values (#{userId}, #{title}, default, #{contents}, #{imagePath}, #{imageName})
mapper.update: update board_tbl set Title= #{title}, contents=#{contents}, WriteDate=default where boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from like_tbl where boardNo = #{boardNo} and userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into like_tbl (likeNo, boardNo, userId, board_like) values((select * from (select max(likeNo)+1 from like_tbl) next), #{boardNo}, #{userId}, 1)
mapper.delete: delete from like_tbl where boardNo = #{boardNo} and userId = #{userId}
